Type.Name: Tree

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Tree extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: is deprecated and unsupported. It is known to be buggy. To use it, you must define the symbol prior to includng the Gtk# header files. Use instead.
The widget is a container that shows users a list of items, in a tree format complete withbranches and leafnodes. Branches can be expanded to show their child items, or collapsed to hide them.
